data.name: Rogue Command Demo
data.detailed_description:
The demo includes 5 levels and should give you a good feel for how the full game plays.
You play the Robo faction and will receive a fixed set of cards, but can still get a feel for finding cool combos with the upgrade system.
data.about_the_game:
The demo includes 5 levels and should give you a good feel for how the full game plays.
You play the Robo faction and will receive a fixed set of cards, but can still get a feel for finding cool combos with the upgrade system.
data.short_description: Rogue Command is a classic real-time strategy game fused with modern roguelike deckbuilding. Collect resources, build a base, assemble an evolving deck full of powerful combos, and push back the ravaging robots in this ever-changing single player experience.
